identity.name: Bee It Feedback
identity.core_philosophy: Corporate Soul. Professional doesn't mean boring. We mix the reliability of Enterprise ERP with the warmth of a hive.
principles: Fusion: Enterprise Data + Organic Warmth (Hexagons, Amber glows)
Dark Mode First: Deep Navy backgrounds to reduce eye strain for long-shift HR work
Content is King: Data visualization must be instant to read (Heatmaps > Tables)
Contrast: High-vis Orange actions against Deep Navy backgrounds

rules: Never use 'Inter' for headings. Use Manrope Bold/ExtraBold.
Headings are always White (#FFFFFF) or Off-White (#F8FAFC).
Body text is never pure white; use Slate-300 or Slate-400 for readability.

buttons.primary: bg-[#F59E0B] hover:bg-[#D97706] text-white font-semibold shadow-lg shadow-orange-500/20 transition-all hover:-translate-y-0.5

cards.highlight: bg-gradient-to-br from-slate-800 to-slate-900 border border-orange-500/20 relative overflow-hidden

inputs.default: bg-slate-950 border-slate-800 focus:border-orange-500 focus:ring-orange-500/20 text-white placeholder:text-slate-500

patterns.hex_bg: Use the existing .hex-pattern class for subtle background texture in the sidebar or hero sections.

assets.icons: Lucide React (default). Use 'Hexagon' icon for branding moments.

phase_1_setup: Configure Tailwind colors to match the 'Bee It' Dark Palette.
Create a 'Layout' component with the Sidebar (Admin/Manager/User variants).
phase_2_components: Customize Shadcn Button, Card, Input, and Badge to match the Dark/Orange theme.
Build the 'FeedbackCard' component with status badges (Em dia, Atrasado, etc.).
phase_3_pages: Login Page: Split screen. Left: Branding/Image, Right: Form. Dark theme.
Dashboard: Bento Grid layout. Key metrics at top. Recent feedbacks list.
Collaborator Profile: Vertical Timeline component for history.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for text unless it's a very large hero title.
DO NOT use pure black (#000000). Use #020617 or #0F172A.
Always add 'transition-all duration-200' to interactive elements.
Ensure contrast ratios meet WCAG AA (Orange text on dark blue might need tweaking - use White text on Orange buttons).
